channel.title: Emotional intelligence on Andres Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Emotional intelligence on Andres Blog

item.title: Control your emotions
item.description: A lot of people find writing difficult. I think so too. When I first started writing, there wasn’t a day that went by that I didn’t end up frustrated. When I tried to articulate an idea, I couldn’t find the words. Often I had no idea what I was writing about. It still happens. When I was really frustrated and wanted to give up, I thought the main problem was that writing was complicated.
